website_summaries.verdict: Mostly composed of hay and fiber-packed pellets, this chinchilla food also contains a handful of yummy corn and wheat cereal pieces for variety and to round out your furry pal’s diet.
pros: Timothy meal, wheat, soybean meal, and oats are the first four ingredients
Enhanced with vitamins, minerals, and essential fatty acids
cons: It would be convenient if this chinchilla food was available in additional sizes

customer_reviews.title: My chin is picky with her food- she loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price considering all chinchilla food seems to be $10+ for even simple boring pebbles often. This price is unbeatable for the different variety of food that is added into this bag. My chinchilla will poop in her bowl if she doesn’t like her food and hardly touch the food. She doesn’t have any issues eating this at all!
customer_reviews.author: Katerade34

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mix
customer_reviews.text: They stopped making the Chinchilla food I was buying for years. This is the one they are using to replace it when it is nothing like the other one, the other one had bay leaves, rose hips, hay, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 179076432100

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Eater
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, my chinchilla loves this brand of food. He also likes the little morsels in this food besides the pellets. He has not eaten morsels on other brands. He used to just throw them out of the dish. This food also has small pieces of timothy hay in the it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Steinberger

customer_reviews.title: My chins love it, but we take out the treats.
customer_reviews.text: Our chins love this food, and when we tried to change it to something else, they didn’t eat. We do take out the treats and give them separately as treats, otherwise they make a mess digging out just the treats to eat them first.
customer_reviews.author: 1GR

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla likes this brand but he would not eat ...
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla likes this brand but he would not eat any of the hay in this mixture. One thing I am a bit concern is that after changing to this brand, my chin drinks much more water and pees more often... I wonder if this formula has too much salt or any additives in it.... Will probably try another brand to test out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My chinchildren love this brand
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillies love this food! It's all I buy for them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Not for chinchilla's
customer_reviews.text: This food it terrible. Chinchillas cannot have foods with treats in them. This does indeed have many, MANY treats. I recommend Oxbow Essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas love this food. Has nice little treats that they pick out first, but still love this.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when we ran out. Chinchillas dove in. Paws 🐾 up.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Chin loves it
customer_reviews.text: My chin loves it. The mixed in treats are big enough so I am able to feed him a couple by hand then give him the regular ones in his food dish.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Lucky charms!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves it, she picks out the treats to eat first
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla was picky about his food. He can't get enough of this!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

product_meta.title: Vitakraft High Fiber Timothy Formula Chinchilla Food (1 Pouch), 3 Lb
product_meta.description: Daily chinchilla diet fortified with key vitamins and nutrients to help maintain health and wellness. VitaSmart® Chinchilla Food is made with a blend of delicious, high-fiber ingredients such as long-strand fiber timothy hay. Enriched timothy pellets, vegetables, and grains provide the basis for this mostly-pelleted diet that is specifically formulated to keep companion chinchillas healthy and satisfied.
feature_bullets: Natural Oils, Omega Fatty Acids And Flax Seed To Support Healthy Skin And Shiny Coat
Fortified Nutrition For A Healthy Diet
